SortDistanceRequestPacket Class Reference

Packet that takes one origin (must be the first item) and sort the destinations (the rest of the items) after the distance to the origin. More...

Detailed Description

Packet that takes one origin (must be the first item) and sort the destinations (the rest of the items) after the distance to the origin.
